author: Michael Moore
method: Beat butter with wooden spoon until soft, and then add the remaining ingredients and beat until smooth.   Alternatively add all ingredients to a food processor and blend until smooth.   Scrape onto cling film or foil and roll to reform.  Refrigerate until ready to use.   Serve on the toast or hot baguette.
ingredients: 250g/9oz butter,  30g/1oz tomato paste,  1 clove garlic, crushed,  ½ tsp thyme, chopped,  ½ tsp rosemary, chopped,  seasoning,  toast or hot baguette for serving
